ARABIC: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُۥ دِينِى

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'It is Allah I worship, making my deen sincerely His,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "I worship God with devotion all-exclusive for Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: “Allah alone shall I serve, consecrating my devotion to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "I worship God alone and devote myself to His religion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim, “I worship only Allah, as His sincere bondman.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Allah Alone I worship by doing religious deeds sincerely for His sake only."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Allah (it is Whom) I serve, being sincere to Him in my obedience:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'God I serve, making my religion His sincerely;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Allah I worship, making my religion pure for Him (only).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "It is God I serve, sincere in my faith in Him alone --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: it is Allah I worship, making for Him my religion exclusive
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘I worship [only] Allah, putting my exclusive faith in Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "It is Allah I serve, with my sincere (and exclusive) devotion:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW) "Allah Alone I worship by doing religious deeds sincerely for His sake only and not to show-off, and not to set up rivals with Him in worship."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'I worship Allah and make my religion sincerely His.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “It is God I worship, sincere in my faith in Him.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Allah [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:14] Say: ‘God [alone] I worship, devoting [my] religion purely to Him, [pure] of any idolatry.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say: Allah I worship, making my religion pure for Him (only)) making my worship and faith in Allah's divine Oneness sincere to Him.
